@startgantt
!theme vibrant

skinparam defaultFontSize 12
project starts 2024-01-01

[需求分析] lasts 10 days
[系统设计] lasts 15 days
[前端开发] lasts 30 days
[后端开发] lasts 35 days
[测试阶段] lasts 20 days
[部署上线] lasts 5 days

[系统设计] starts after [需求分析]'s end
[前端开发] starts after [系统设计]'s end
[后端开发] starts after [系统设计]'s end
[测试阶段] starts after [前端开发]'s end
[测试阶段] starts after [后端开发]'s end
[部署上线] starts after [测试阶段]'s end

@enduml
